projects.title: Solar PV I-V & P-V Curve Analysis
projects.description: Analysis of solar photovoltaic panel characteristics with varying irradiance and temperature. Generates I-V and P-V curves to understand solar panel behavior.

renewable.name: Renewable Energy Analysis
renewable.description: Solar, wind, biomass energy system analysis and optimization

power.name: Power Systems & Electrical
power.description: Circuit analysis, load flow, fault detection and power quality

heat.name: Heat Transfer & Thermodynamics
heat.description: Temperature distribution, heat conduction, convection analysis

control.name: Control Systems
control.description: Transfer functions, stability analysis, PID controllers

simulink.name: Simulink Models
simulink.description: Block diagram simulations, system dynamics, control loops
